name: Hypermedia Systems
tag_list: gsm-gateway, voip-gateway, sms-gateway, voice-gateways-manufacturer, sms-hardware, call-termination-systems
overview:
Hypermedia Systems Ltd. develops and markets next-generation telecommunication products. Optimized for medium-to-large enterprises, its products create ways for companies to upgrade current telecommunication systems while leveraging their existing telecom investment.

Its HyperGateway family of professional multi-media cellular gateways enable companies to maximize call-savings, extend existing PBX & IP-PBX phone systems functionality, and gain benefits from add-on applications (Single-Number Reach, CTI, Callback, SMS & more), all-in-one box.

The Company’s variety of Mobile Network Access Systems, Gateways and CTI applications enable organizations to extend mobility, manageability and productivity farther than ever before. Currently Hypermedia serves Enterprise and Civil Administration / Government customers through a network of business and OEM partners worldwide in more than seventy countries around the globe.
